<<<<<<< HEAD
The tyranny of Satan, discovered by the teares of a converted sinner, in a sermon preached in Paules Church, on the 28 of August, 1642. By Thomas Gage, formerly a Romish Priest, for the space of 38 yeares, and now truly reconciled to the Church of England. Gage, Thomas, 1603?-1656.
[10], 27, [1] p.
Printed by Tho. Badger, for Humphrey Mosley, at the Prince's Armes in Pauls Church-yard, London : M.DC.XLII. [1642]
Annotation on Thomason copy: "Octo: 3". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
